tasks.dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "deno run -A scripts/generate-proto-descriptor.ts; deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys --allow-ffi --unstable-ffi src/server.ts"
tasks.plugin:mcv:build: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if(-not (Test-Path -Path './release/plugins/botnama')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path './release/plugins/botnama' -Force | Out-Null }; dotnet build plugins/mcv-botnama/MCV.Botnama.Plugin.csproj -c Release -o ./release/plugins/botnama"
tasks.release: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if(-not (Test-Path -Path './release')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path './release' | Out-Null }; .\scripts\prune-npm-packages.ps1; deno run -A scripts/generate-proto-descriptor.ts; deno compile -A --no-check --output release/botnama.exe --include public --icon public/icons/boicon.ico --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc src/server.ts"
tasks.release:local: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if(-not (Test-Path -Path './release')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path './release' | Out-Null }; .\scripts\prune-npm-packages.ps1; deno run -A scripts/generate-proto-descriptor.ts; deno compile -A --no-check --output release/botnama --include public src/server.ts"
